name: The Day That Ice Melt
description:
Glaciers are melting...don't touch the water

Follow the lightbeams and reunite with your herd

Move with W,A,S,D and rotate camera with mouse  Jump with Spacebar

Collect "Spirit Spheres" to activate Spirit Howl (Q) when glowing  and get a temporal speed boost

Pause with Esc/P

Content used that was previously created:

  • Wolf from ANIMAL VARIETY PACK
  • Particles from Advanced Magic FX 12 and Advanced Magic FX 13
  • Landscape from Brushify - Arctic Pack
  • Wolf outline material from First Person Story Adventure Template
  • Chameleon Post Process for Post Processing
